entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
